context: Tests whether the agent knows the specific effort level values for candidate generation and the criteria used to select the best optimization candidate.

checklist.name: Candidate counts by effort
checklist.description: States correct N_OPTIMIZER_CANDIDATES values: LOW=3, MEDIUM=5, HIGH=6 (at least 2 of 3 correct)

checklist.name: Speedup as primary selector
checklist.description: States that the winning candidate is selected primarily by highest speedup ratio

checklist.name: Diff length as tiebreaker
checklist.description: States that for tied speedups, shortest diff length from original is used as tiebreaker

checklist.name: Refinement ranking weights
checklist.description: States that refinement candidates use weighted ranking with runtime weighted more heavily than diff (2:1 ratio or REFINED_CANDIDATE_RANKING_WEIGHTS=(2,1))
